name: Tetrapulse
blurb: Save infinite worlds with the only weapon you have left: your own life force. (PC/Mac/Linux)

rewards.reward: THANKS: ==============================\r\nYou are nice, pleasant even. Your name will be in the credits of the game. Thanks for your support!

PERSONALIZED VINE: ==============================          \r\nThe Amiable will create a 6-second Vine just for you and tweet it at you! *requires a Twitter or Vine account (they're free!) You also receive our thanks and your name in the credits of the game.
THE GAME: ==============================\r\nGet a digital copy of Tetrapulse plus a personalized Vine and your name in the credits of the game! (PC, Mac, or Linux)

EARLY ACCESS, DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK, DIGITAL ART PACK, KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE SKIN: ============================== Get your hands on a beta copy of Tetrapulse and play before anyone else. (Plus, you'll still receive the full game upon release.) Receive a copy of the digital soundtrack as well as a digital art pack! Art pack includes wallpapers for both desktop and mobile as well as concept art and sketches. You'll also get an exclusive Kickstarter backer character skin to show off to all your friends. Includes all previous non-limited rewards.

FOUR PACK: ==============================\r\nGet 4 copies of Tetrapulse! Perfect for sharing the co-op love with your friends. You\u2019ll also get your name in the credits, as well as a vine from our team.

TETRAPULSE TEE AND DELVE DEEPER: ============================== Get the newly designed Tetrapulse T-shirt AND a digital copy of Delve Deeper, a turn-based action game by Lunar Giant, along with all of its additional downloadable content. Includes all previous non-limited rewards.

FOUR PACK XL: ============================== Get 4 copies of the game AND beta access to go with each copy! All 4 copies of the game will also come with a soundtrack, a digital art pack, and a Kickstarter exclusive character for those who backed the game early! Oh yeah, and the vine and your name in the credits!
POSTER AND BUTTONS: ==============================\r\nGet a 11x17" Tetrapulse poster and 5 unique metallic buttons. Includes all previous non-limited rewards.
TETRAPULSE T-SHIRT:\r\n============================== Tetrapulse t-shirt that is exclusive for Kickstarter backers. Includes all previous non-limited rewards.

3D PRINTED CHARACTER AND CONCEPT ART: ==============================\r\nTake home your very own 3D printed Tetrapulse Stone Golum and original concept art signed by the artist, Peter Sheff! This 3 inch tall statue is made out of strong nylon material and will be available in a few different colors. Includes all previous non-limited rewards.

DESIGN AN ENEMY: ==============================
Work with the developers over Skype to design your own enemy to be included in the game! Help 
define how it moves, which attacks it has, and how it interacts with players. Includes all previous 
tiers. Includes all previous non-limited rewards.
DESIGN A CHARACTER: ==============================\r\nWork with the developers over Skype to design your very own character to be included in the game! Includes all previous non-limited rewards.

4 CUSTOM TETRAPULSE CONTROLLERS: ==============================\r\nPlay Tetrapulse in style with your very own set of four custom made controllers. Controllers are colored to match each of the four characters with matching LED center button. The shell is embellished with a unique symbol for each character along with the Tetrapulse Logo. Includes all previous non-limited rewards.

GIANT 3D PRINTED SCULPTURE: ============================== A large 3D printed nylon sculpture manufactured in Chicago just for you. This sculpture will feature an action scene with several characters attached to the Heartstone. Includes all previous non-limited rewards.

CUSTOM 8-STICK TETRAPULSE ARCADE CABINET: ==============================\r\nMake all your friends jealous and get a one of a kind Tetrapulse arcade cabinet equipped with eight joysticks for four players! Adorned with Tetrapulse symbols and beautiful hand crafted details, this cabinet is fit for only the biggest Tetrapulse fan of all. Includes all previous rewards.
